Key Match Events: Quentin Grimes drove past Austin Reaves and threw a one-handed pass to P.J. Washington for a reverse dunk.
Klay Thompson and Jaden Hardy knocked down three consecutive 3-pointers to establish momentum.
Spencer Dinwiddie drove into the paint for an open dunk after Lakers doubled Thompson.
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Kidd emphasized the importance of team chemistry and resilience after the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks demonstrated roster depth and adaptability despite injuries to Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving.
The team's ability to maintain momentum and avoid a losing streak was highlighted.
Others: The game was against the Los Angeles Lakers on 2025-01-08.
The Mavericks were shorthanded with several key players injured.
